comment: Truly one of the best professor you could ask for in IAD department. Laid back, but super informative! Would 10000% take again

I took this class in Spring 2024, and I was a bit nervous because I do not have any background in coding. But, this class was fun and exciting . All of his assignments have clear instructions and are easy to follow. If I could give him more stars I would. He is a very respectful and kind man, and gives you feedback on all of our assignments.
